sources.title: Teenagers Battle The Thing
sources.description: A mummified ape man is brought back to life and wreaks havok. This movie was shot in 1958 and is black and white. A later version of this film was released in color with a half hour of new scenes shot in 1972 added and titled "Curse Of Bigfoot".

metadata.Plot: Archaeology students uncover a prehistoric manster... part man, part monster, and all bad attitude with a cheap costume.
metadata.Actors: Bob Clymire, Bill Simonsen, Jan Swihart
